definition[0]_en: An aspect ratio designation for an expression of a moving image work whose ratio is less than 1.5:1.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An aspect ratio designation for an expression of a moving image work whose ratio is less than 1.5:1.

definition[0]_en: An aspect ratio designation for an expression of a moving image work whose ratio is equal to or greater than 1.5:1.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An aspect ratio designation for an expression of a moving image work whose ratio is equal to or greater than 1.5:1.

definition[0]_en: An aspect ratio designation for an expression of a moving image work that includes multiple aspect ratios within the same expression.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An aspect ratio designation for an expression of a moving image work that includes multiple aspect ratios within the same expression.
